review: I am really so pleased with this product. I love the free streaming through Amazon Prime, the netflix app loads very quickly in comparison to my PC, and it has made streaming videos and music hassle free!
author: laura scalia

review: gets over heated .... It never work properly since the first week I had it!
author: Rasheeda Dove

review: Yes I like it very much. Plan on getting another one real soon
author: sara greene

review: It's awesome we love it. It does exactly what we need it for.
author: Natmar

review: WELL WORTH THE COST.  EASY TO CONNECT AND OPERATE.
author: ROBERT C MEDER

review: Exceeded our expectations. Way better variety of shows and movies than Netflix. Purchasing Amazon prime was well worth the money for all the free movies, TV shows and music you get.
author: erin meehan

review: We love it! We have the Fire TV console in the living room, but wanted something small for the bedroom. No complaints at all, just love it.
author: elvisfiend
